remarks: Closure of the order relation on a structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdsle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` P ) $.
prdsless $p |- ( ph -> .<_ C_ ( B X. B ) ) $.
